<droussic@...> wrote:

> and here come my problems :
> - to run a build script with a <junitreport> task, I added (as 
> advised) xalan.jar (Xalan-J-2.0.1), and I get :

I think the release has been built with Xalan's compatibility lib, so
that it now works with Xalan-1 but not -2, not sure though.

Using JAXP-1.1 reference (the version of Xalan included there and
crimson) the junitreport task works, at least if I compile the task
myself.

As this is an Ant question much more than a JUnit question, take a
look at the ant-user mailing list archive, this topic has been
discussed there quite frequently - see
<http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-user&r=1&w=2>.

Stefan
subject: Re: [junit] junitreport task - Libraries dependencies
